{"step_by_step_thinking": "Osteoma is a benign bone tumor, not a reactive lesion of the gingiva. Traumatic neuroma is a nerve injury, not a reactive lesion of the gingiva. Irritation fibroma is a reactive lesion, but it does not demonstrate bone radiographically or microscopically. Peripheral ossifying fibroma is a reactive lesion of the gingiva that often demonstrates bone radiographically and even microscopically.", "answer_choice": "B. Peripheral ossifying fibroma"}
